attributes.action: Stop Stalling & Enact Article 50 NOW! BREXIT needs to mean BREXIT NOW ....
attributes.additional_details:
The constant delays we see being enacted, show a complete and utter disregard for the Views of the People of THIS COUNTRY. 
We voted OUT, so GET US OUT NOW!. 
Tighten our Border Controls now, and deport ANY convicted Terrorist along with their entire family. STOP allowing benefits to fund a group who are out to destroy this country. 
Ensure sharia is completely outlawed in Britain. BRITISH LAW FOR BRITAIN!
attributes.background: Theresa May must STOP STALLING, and enact Article 50 before the end of 2016, to GET Britain OUT OF THE EU! ... The borders need to be tightened, and the Christians and other Law Abiding Citizens of this country given more respect, and more SUPPORT! Any Terrorist and their family should be deported.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133618

Petitions stay open on the site for six months. We can't accept a petition calling for the same action while the existing petition is still open.
